html:
7.20.20  6:11 am   Should I play at the airport terminal at the airport terminal I'm in rn? I asked this question a few months ago I can't find it.

      could be nice to celebrate, congratulations on going somewhere. that is a significant achievement in today's day and age

7.20.20  4:27 am   Do you think the methods you're reinventing would revoloutionize the way people make videos?

      first let's see if it even works

7.20.20  4:05 am   do you typically do all the question answering in the morning or the evening

      no

7.20.20  1:27 am   How can I learn to think more spontaneously like you do?

      sometimes a good first thing to do is take your whole language and spread it out on the table. see what you're working with

7.20.20  1:15 am   Why should i exist?

      to show others how it can be done. or if you're not sure, it can be fun also to learn someone else's way

7.20.20  12:48 am   how do you deal with the painful suffering when making a video?

      you could try to invent a less painful way. you know it's possible, because if you think about the current way it's definitely 100x less painful than it was 100 years ago

7.20.20  12:03 am   why did you used to take screenshots of textedit for all the text in your videos? is final cut express really that bad?

      no, it turns out the screenshot method is just really that good

7.20.20  12:01 am   every time i listen to your music i get really inspired. i just wanna know, how do you manage to have such a variety of sounds in your songs?

      the trick is, instead of finding a sound for each place in the song, find a place in the song for each sound. DON'T put it if it doesn't fit, but just keep searching from place to place until it really fits. doesn't count if it doesn't fit. with this technique you have to keep searching until it really fits, but it does still also have to go somewhere. but NOT anywhere, has to fit. but it has to go somewhere. i hope i have explained that properly. Also, you still have to do the song's core with fewer and more reliable basic instruments, but the decorations should be done on a 'what then when' basis rather than a 'when then what' basis. this is for production. writing usually goes the other way (when-what)

7.19.20  11:46 pm   When's the last time you went to New Canaan?

      may 15, 2009

7.19.20  11:12 pm   What's the most funny thing you've ever heard?

      the news

7.19.20  10:49 pm   how are you so epic

      that could be from the extreme amounts of normalcy i possess

7.19.20  10:36 pm   will you come back to YouTube :((( or are you working on a thing inventor

      that literally is what i am working on

7.19.20  9:57 pm   About how long does it take you to make one video on average?

      we'll see

7.19.20  9:21 pm   what enables you to keep doing what you do

      doing it better than ever before

7.19.20  8:13 pm   how do you know when you want your idea to become something that exists also outside of your mind?

      always. i always want that

7.19.20  7:52 pm   how do you feel about feelings

      thoughtful

7.19.20  6:59 pm   so you're a "musician?" name every song

      john lennon 'war is over (happy christmas)', tchaikovsky 'dance of the reed flutes',

7.19.20  6:20 pm   i'm having a hard time making music lately, any advice?

      try making something to go with music, or something for music to go with. that can snap the whole picture into focus sometimes

7.19.20  5:12 pm   In you "I just did a bad thing" video you literally described 2020

      i described potentially other times too

7.19.20  5:11 pm   Can you give me a sneak peak of the future video/videos?

     yes but not yet

     Can you please tell us when the next vid come? 

      no, that's because i don't know

7.19.20  5:02 pm   Where do we go when we sleep?

      anywhere you could ever imagine

7.19.20  4:11 pm   what happened to the business man in mount st helens is about to blow up?

      a music video

7.19.20  3:37 pm   do u have any plants?

      am plant

7.19.20  3:18 pm   Is a muffin a cupcake

      a muffin is the equivalent of 2 cupcakes

7.19.20  3:04 pm   when i feel too sad and stupid to be worthy of even looking at my instrument let alone trying to play it, i come here and keep clicking the randy button until i read something that gives my soul a little nudge and keeps me going. this strategy hasn't ever failed me. thank you bill, and also thank you everyone who interacts with the questions page. sending all the loving kindness i can muster out to the whole entire world

      holy grade A can of worms voted county's best, you are very friendly

7.19.20  3:03 pm   Bill what to do when you realise that the keyboard you've had for 7 years doesn't have dynamic sensitivity (PSR-150)

      upgrade to one of the other PSRs and realize you are at least 4 times less bad then you thought

7.19.20  2:08 pm   What are your thoughts on the number 459?

      17x3x3x3

7.19.20  1:44 pm   do the dates on your songs page correspond to when you finished writing them or when you finished recording them?

      recording

7.19.20  1:23 pm   Bill, I'm trapped in Ohio can you help me??

      just keep going until you reach a big blue shield number road, and follow it any direction except north

7.19.20  1:20 pm   why is everything so stupid ?

      that could be due to intelligence

7.19.20  12:26 pm   How and where do you think of your weird and interesting video ideas?

      en route

7.19.20  12:11 pm   most of these questions seem like what one would ask artificial intelligence software or something. what do you feel about it?

     would be better with even more intelligence

     and how do you manage to be so mysterious? 

     found a great deal on cloaks. got a 900 pack of cloaks, and they're very strong, re-usable. i'm still only on the 2nd one, out of 900

7.19.20  11:43 am   why are most of the answers you type quotes from videos you made

      hopefully none of them are. i generally have a policy against that. Most of the QUESTIONS, however, are quotes from videos. but i skip those ones mostly, and the ones you see here are the remaining minority

7.19.20  11:13 am   What do you think about Canada?

      in canada there is no speed limit. only maximum speed

7.19.20  10:18 am   I read an enjoyable book and ran out of pages. What should be my next steps to solve that problem?

      i think that's obvious

7.19.20  10:16 am   have you set a release date for the release of your next video(s), similar to the dec 1st date set for hotewig? there was a countdown timer but that has since faded away. the incentive to expedite your workflow and do things as quickly as possible are greatly fueled by an imaginary standard that is placed upon oneself in order to satisfy the hungry. 

      yes, i am proud to announce it is sheer panic that fuels me

7.19.20  10:11 am   Hey Mr. Billman. What genre of music would you classify your videos as? Fictional is fine.

      i classify the videos as either songs or non songs, and amongst non-song videos then it's either fictional or non fictional. song videos i classify based whether whether i'm seen on camera or not. that's the genres of videos, not music. the genre of music in song videos is usually 'normal' and the genre of the music that is SUNG in the non-song videos is called 'reasonable', and the rest of the underscoring music found in the non-song videos is considered 'sensible'

7.19.20  9:34 am   Are there any other instruments you'd like to learn in addition to the ones you already play?

      yes, learning them now

7.19.20  9:07 am   I find it interesting that you only speak in lowercase. Is that to match how you speak in videos or do you just prefer it?

      lowercase is the case mostly used by people living on EARTH which i have learned to replicate as much as possible until people actually believe that i live here

7.19.20  7:44 am   What are your thoughts on boats?

      great for carrying non-water from place to place

7.19.20  7:32 am   Choose wisely. Holding shift or toggling 'caps lock'?

      for 3 or more consecutive capital letters, i would choose caps lock

7.19.20  6:00 am   hey bill can u please make a video?

      that doesn't sound like enough videos

7.19.20  5:25 am   new vid?

      yep that's me

7.19.20  5:11 am   when will you retire?

      some other time

7.19.20  4:56 am   do you are the have video

      yep that's me

7.19.20  3:31 am   What is the definition of ironic?

      it changes about every 5 years or so. it currently means stupid

7.19.20  2:41 am   why can't the world go back to normal now

      because it wants to be even better

7.19.20  2:29 am   any tips on ear training

      start learning every song you know

7.19.20  2:01 am   are your new videos gonna be awesome?  

      yes

7.19.20  12:44 am   Do your ideas on creativity (thinking playfully, feel meaningfully. At speed) work outside of your music?

      yes
